title: Portero's Clarbour on the Luxury Consignment Industry (Audio)
itunes:title: Portero's Clarbour on the Luxury Consignment Industry (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: LUXURY: Alexis Clarbour, Executive Director of Portero, on the pre-owned luxury goods market, and their extensive collection of pristine Hermès Birkin handbags.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
